item.title: Unique setting brings warmth to winter
item.author: Matthew Jesse,
item.description: The Winter’s Tale is a true winter’s delight. It is performed at the Globe Theatre, but fear not as it isn’t an outdoor getting-wet-standing-in-the-pit affair, rather you are welcomed to an enchanting theatre tucked next door, the recently built Sam Wanamaker Playhouse. The Playhouse is a replica of …
